src/app/play.summary: Next.js dynamic route for playing adventures; fetches adventure data and renders PlayerPage component.

src/features/player.summary: Main player container component; orchestrates state initialization and composes NodeViewer, PlayerControls, and ScrollyTracker.
Barrel export for player feature; exposes public API (PlayerPage, hooks) to other parts of the app.

src/features/player/components.summary: Renders a single node's content (rich text, images, audio, video) with transitions between nodes.
Navigation UI with next/back/menu/restart buttons; dispatches state changes to playerStore.
Scroll-based storytelling component using Intersection Observer; triggers narrative progress on scroll events.

src/features/player/hooks.summary: Hook for player session state; provides current node, navigation history, and actions (goNext, goBack, restart).

src/app/editor.summary: Next.js route for editor; loads adventure data and renders GraphCanvas alongside NodePanel in split layout.
Editor-specific layout; excludes public header/footer, provides editor chrome and providers.

src/features/editor/graph.summary: React Flow canvas wrapper; configures viewport, node/edge types, and event callbacks for graph interactions.
Barrel export for graph feature; exposes GraphCanvas and related components.

src/features/editor/graph/components.summary: Custom React Flow node component; displays node title, type icon, status badge, and handles selection.
Custom React Flow edge component; shows link label, delete handle, and visual styling for connections.

src/features/editor/graph/hooks.summary: Two-way sync hook between React Flow state and Zustand adventureStore; handles selection, drag, and CRUD operations.

src/features/editor/node-panel.summary: Right-side panel container with tabs for Node, Link, and Adventure Settings; switches views based on selection.
Barrel export for node-panel feature; exposes NodePanel and form components.

src/features/editor/node-panel/component.summary: Form for editing node properties: title, type, visual props; controlled inputs bound to Zustand state.
Form for editing link properties: label, target node, conditions; with node autocomplete selector.
Tiptap editor wrapper with toolbar, emoji-mart integration, and media embedding support for node content.
Form for adventure-level settings: title, description, cover image, start node, and metadata.
Inline media selector button; opens MediaLibrary modal and returns selected media to parent form.

src/features/editor/node-panel/hooks.summary: Hook for panel state management; tracks selection, dirty flag, validation errors, and form submission.

src/app/(public).summary: Shared layout for public pages; includes Header, Footer, and common providers for all public routes.
Homepage route; renders HomePage component with adventure listing and category filters.

src/app.summary: Global 404 page with themed styling and optional typing animation effect.

src/features/public.summary: Homepage component with adventure grid, category filtering, and search functionality.
Barrel export for public feature; exposes page components.

src/features/public/components.summary: Single adventure card component; displays thumbnail, title, category, and links to player.
Category filter UI with tabs or dropdown; filters adventure list by selected category.
Shared layout component for static info pages; provides consistent prose styling and structure.
Typing animation component for 404 page; recreates legacy visual effect using React hooks.

src/app.summary: Root application layout; configures fonts, global providers (Theme, Toast), and document structure.

src/features/ui-core.summary: Barrel export for ui-core feature; exposes components, primitives, and providers.

src/features/ui-core/components.summary: Site header component with logo, navigation links, and responsive mobile menu.
Site footer component with credits, links, and branding.
Lightbox/zoom component for images; modal overlay with zoom and pan functionality.
Lucide icon wrapper component; provides consistent icon API and default styling.

src/features/ui-core/primitives.summary: shadcn/ui Button component with variants (primary, secondary, ghost) and size options.
shadcn/ui Dialog component wrapping Radix Dialog; accessible modal with focus trap.
shadcn/ui DropdownMenu component wrapping Radix; accessible dropdown with keyboard navigation.
shadcn/ui Tabs component wrapping Radix; accessible tabbed interface.
shadcn/ui Tooltip component wrapping Radix; accessible tooltip with positioning.
shadcn/ui Input component; styled text input with focus states and error styling.
shadcn/ui Select component wrapping Radix; accessible dropdown select with search.
shadcn/ui Textarea component; styled multiline text input.

src/features/ui-core/providers.summary: Theme context provider; sets CSS variables for adventure-specific fonts and colors at runtime.
Sonner toast provider configuration; wraps app with toast portal and default styling.

src/features/ui-core/styles.summary: Global CSS with Tailwind directives, CSS custom properties, and base style resets.
next/font configuration for Google Fonts and custom font faces; exports font class names.

src/lib.summary: Tailwind class merge utility combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional class names.
Markdown helper utilities for legacy content migration or any remaining markdown processing needs.

src/config.summary: Site-wide configuration constants: site name, URLs, default values, and feature flags.

src/features/state.summary: Barrel export for state feature; exposes stores, API functions, hooks, and types.

src/features/state/stores.summary: Zustand store for adventure data model; holds nodes, links, metadata with CRUD actions and persist middleware.
Zustand store for editor UI state; tracks selected node/link, panel mode, and dirty flag.
Zustand store for player session; manages current node, navigation history, and playback state.

src/features/state/api.summary: Typed fetch wrapper with base URL configuration, auth header injection, and error handling.
Adventure API functions: loadAdventure, saveAdventure, listAdventures, deleteAdventure with typed responses.
Media API functions: uploadMedia, getMediaList, deleteMedia with progress tracking support.

src/features/state/hooks.summary: Hook combining adventureStore with API; handles loading, saving, and syncing adventure data.
Autosave hook with debouncing; subscribes to store changes and triggers periodic saves.

src/features/state/types.summary: TypeScript interfaces for Adventure, Node, Link, and AdventureSettings; single source of truth for data shapes.
TypeScript interfaces for MediaItem, UploadResult, and MediaListResponse.

src/features/media.summary: Full media browser component; displays grid of uploaded media with filters, search, and selection.
Barrel export for media feature; exposes MediaLibrary, uploader, and hooks.

src/features/media/components.summary: Drag-and-drop upload zone with file validation, progress bar, and error display.
Grid display of media items with thumbnails, selection state, and delete action.

src/features/media/hooks.summary: Upload state management hook; tracks progress, handles errors, and updates media list on success.

src/lib.summary: Tailwind class merge utility combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional class names.
Markdown helper utilities for legacy content migration or any remaining markdown processing needs.

src/config.summary: Site-wide configuration constants: site name, URLs, default values, and feature flags.
